Text.Page:
Have you come seeking the Floating Stone?
Make sure you have your goal firmly in mind before proceeding.

This is the Cliff Path of Koleogg, but to reach the Floating Stone you'll need the help of someone on the Medium Path.

To open the door, it will take 2 teams.

One to destroy the monument here, and the other to do the same on the Medium Path.

If you don't mind some free advice...
Use the Tuberelle hidden in the ground.
